mapper.select: SELECT id,title, price,image, sell_point AS sellPoint FROM t_goods WHERE category_id=#{categoryId} ORDER BY priority DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{count}
SELECT id, category_id AS categoryId, item_type AS itemType, title, sell_point AS sellPoint, price,num, barcode,image, status,priority FROM t_goods WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, price, image FROM t_goods WHERE status=1 AND num>0 ORDER BY priority DESC LIMIT 0, #{count}
